title: Winning the Super Bowl showed Rams made all the right moves

sentence: For one, Wilson, 33 years young, isnt Herschel Walker.
author: Sean Keeler
title: Keeler: Russell Wilson isnt Herschel Walker. Broncos arent 1989 Vikings. Anybody who says George Paton got robbed is full of it.

sentence: But there are many, many other reasons, I think, to be concerned about Herschel Walker as a Senate candidate.''
title: Herschel Walker: From football stardom to troubling Senate candidate
